name: Peepers
description:
A game about the stare of others, where the oppressing entity hunts the character.

Now, V2 is available ! With a main menu and pause menu ! Enjoy. :)

This game was made at the RIJV gameJam. In a 48 hours timespan, from 2017-07-07 to 2017-07-09

Crédits :
Pierre-François Di Piazza, Laura Minet, Julien Obrebski, Raphael Anic-Antic & Florian Nolin
